[Page Title: Charleston Beer Works – Upper King's Original Sports Bar]

weekly specials

Thursday
Bar + Music Bingo 
Bar Bingo Every 3rd Thursday + Music Bingo on Last Thursday

Friday
Live Music 
Sam Adams Music Series$5 Sam Lager and Sam Seasonal
Saturday & SUnday Pitcher Specials 
$12 Bud Light$15 Michelob Ultra$15 Sam Adams

Over 1,250,000 Pints
and Counting! 
It’s simple. We created Charleston Beer Works with these things in mind...friends, cold beer, best friends, fresh food, more friends and an extra helping of sports.

We are a come as you are Charleston bar- a craft beer bar, a modern sports bar and a fresh kitchen wrapped into one great place. A place where the Charleston locals and our friends that are visiting want to comeback for more. Enjoy the downstairs bar, the upstairs bar or a great seat on the patio...whatever vibe you’re feeling!

At CBW, our team works hard everyday so you can relax and enjoy your free time. Our Certified Beer Servers are here to guide you across a long list of local and regional craft beers, updated weekly. We have over 48 beers on tap, in addition to the classic favorites, plenty more in bottles and cans - and yes, a growing, impressive list of premium spirits and wines. Charleston Beer Works features made from scratch bar foods, with a daily special or two, and live entertainment Thursday through Saturday to keep the good times rolling!

Lively, Uncomplicated...and yes, beer is always the answer. What was the question?
CBW: 
Visit Us

480 King Street
Charleston, SC 29403
(843) 577-5885

Events

music

[Page Title: Private Events – Charleston Beer Works]

Private
Events Charleston Beer Works’ upstairs bar is available for private event rentals. 
Host your private game viewing, birthday get-together or rent out the area for your wedding reception after party! Your event’s menu can be customized by our chef. Our large beer selection is available, as well as an option to create signature drinks. Get in touch with us if you’re interested in learning more about the space and event options.
Planning an event? Get in touch! 
Private Events

[Page Title: Menu – Charleston Beer Works]

Check out our
Menus 
In the Charleston Beer Works kitchen, we make it our mission to exceed the expectations of your everyday “Sports Bar” pub grub. We accomplish this by providing a fun and casual-creative menu that focuses on high quality, fresh ingredients and a made from scratch attitude. From our house ground beef burgers, local breads, house made soups, and many more… cooked to order just for you every time!
